description:
Dolce Garden Eau de Parfum 75ml - A Blossoming Floral Paradise

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce Garden EDP, a mesmerizing floral gourmand fragrance that transports you to a sun-drenched Sicilian garden in full bloom. This exquisite 75ml women's perfume from Dolce & Gabbana captures the essence of Mediterranean beauty with its enchanting blend of tropical florals and creamy gourmand notes. âœ¨

The Essence of Dolce Garden Perfume

Dolce Garden opens with a burst of fresh, juicy mandarin orange and vibrant neroli, creating an immediate sense of Mediterranean sunshine. The heart reveals a lush bouquet of frangipani flowers and ylang-ylang, while the base notes of coconut essence and warm vanilla create a deliciously creamy finish that lingers on the skin. This floral gourmand fragrance perfectly balances sweetness with sophistication, making it ideal for the confident, feminine woman. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 75ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

Fragrance Journey of Dolce Garden

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Mandarin Orange, Neroli, Magnolia
Heart Notes Frangipani Flower, Ylang-Ylang, Coconut Cream
Base Notes Vanilla Absolute, Sandalwood, Almond Milk

Key Features of Dolce Garden EDP

  • Luxurious 75ml floral fragrance with exceptional longevity ðŸ’Ž
  • Unique blend of tropical florals and gourmand notes ðŸŒ¿
  • Elegant glass bottle adorned with a handcrafted flower cap
  • Perfect for spring and summer occasions
  • Created by master perfumer Violaine Collas
  • Joins the prestigious Dolce & Gabbana fragrance collection

Launched in 2018, Dolce Garden represents a fresh chapter in the Dolce fragrance story. This gourmand floral scent was inspired by the lush gardens of Sicily, where vibrant flowers bloom under the Mediterranean sun. The bottle design continues the elegant aesthetic of the Dolce line, featuring a rounded silhouette and the signature flower-shaped cap that has become an iconic symbol of the collection. ðŸ”¥

Discover why Dolce Garden EDP has become a best-selling fragrance for women who appreciate the perfect balance of floral sophistication and sweet indulgence. Add this captivating scent to your collection and experience the blossoming paradise of Dolce Garden. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Dolce Garden EDP last on the skin?
Dolce Garden Eau de Parfum offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on the skin. The creamy coconut and vanilla base notes create a beautiful sillage that lingers throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with other products from the Dolce Garden collection.

Discover Dolce Garden EDP (75ml), a sun-drenched floral gourmand fragrance by Dolce & Gabbana. This captivating blend of frangipani flowers, coconut cream, and vanilla absolute transports you to a blooming Sicilian paradise. Perfect for the confident, feminine woman seeking sweet sophistication.
